title: Laboratory in Cognitive Psychology I
description: This course provides training in the design, execution, and analysis of cognitive psychology experiments. Students may not receive credit for both PSYC 115 and PSYC 115A. Open to the following majors only: PC26, PC28, PC29, PC30, PC31, PC32, PC33, PC34, CG32. Prerequisites: upper-division standing and PSYC 60 or equivalent; an interview with the instructor is required.
